___StartTime.description: The start time of the Service associated with this Endpoint (DateTime_t)

___ServingState.description: If the endpoint is accepting and serving requests

___ImplementationVersion.description: The version of the implementation of the Endpoint

___Semantics.description: URL(s) of documents providing human-readable descriptions of the semantics of the Endpoint

___InterfaceExtension.description: URIs identifying supported extensions to the interface protocol

___SupportedProfile.description: URI(s) identifying supported profiles for the Endpoint

___WSDL.description: URLs of WSDL document(s) describing the interface

___HealthStateInfo.description: A human-readable explanation of the HealthState of this Endpoint

___TrustedCA.description: DN(s) of CAs trusted by this Endpoint

___Implementor.description: The name of the main organization implementing the Endpoint

___DowntimeEnd.description: When the next scheduled downtime will end (DateTime_t)

___ActivityID.description: IDs of Activities being managed through this Endpoint

___AccessPolicyID.description: IDs of AccessPolicies associated with this Endpoint

___ShareID.description: The IDs of the Shares accessible from this Endpoint

___DowntimeStart.description: When the next scheduled downtime will start (DateTime_t)

___IssuerCA.description: The DN of the CA issuing the certificate presented by this Endpoint

___HealthState.description: The operational status of the Endpoint

___ImplementationName.description: The name of the implementation of the Endpoint

___DowntimeAnnounce.description: When the next scheduled downtime was announced (DateTime_t)

___DowntimeInfo.description: Human-readable of the next scheduled downtime

___ServiceID.description: The ID of the Service associated with this Endpoint

___InterfaceVersion.description: The version of the primary interface protocol (free format)
